results.title: What are the best things to do in Tallinn during winter holiday 2025?
results.content: The city's UNESCO World Heritage Old Town becomes a winter wonderland with snow-dusted medieval architecture, festive markets, and a unique Nordic atmosphere.

results.title: 21.11 – 28.12.2025 - Tallinn Christmas Market
results.content: For the first time, the adventure company 360 KRAADI will be present at the Christmas Market, offering adventurous city tours in the Old Town.

results.title: Guided Tours — Eesti Arhitektuurikeskus
results.content: * Tours Our tour guides are all people with passion for architecture – architects and landscape architects, architecture and art historians, people writing about architecture, urbanists. #### Tour around the heart of Tallinn ##### This tour will take you to see some of the landmarks in the centre of Tallinn. ##### On this unique tour organised by the Estonian Centre for Architecture, architecture enthusiasts get a sneak peek behind the long-shut doors of the legendary Linnahall Concert Hall in Tallinn. #### The Big Tour of Tallinn ##### The big tour of Tallinn will show you the heart of Tallinn centre with some of its most exciting contemporary landmarks. ##### This tour will take you to see the finest and most exciting examples of Soviet architecture across Tallinn.
